article:
All the birds came to the magpie  to ask how to build nests  . The magpie is the   _  of all at building nests.  _  she put them round her and began to  _  how to do it. First, she took
some mud   and   _  a round cake with it.
"Oh, that's how it's done!" said the thrush , and it   _  away. Then the magpie
took some twigs   and put them round in the   _  .
The blackbird  said, "Now I   _  all about it!"
and flew off. Later the magpie put another layer   of mud over the twigs. "That's quite obvious!" the owl  said and flew away.   _  this, the magpie took some twigs and
put them round the outside. "The very thing!" said the sparrow and it went off too. Then the magpie took some features   and covered the inside of the nest very   _  with them. "That
suits me!" cried the starling , and off  it flew.
So it   went on  ,
every bird taking away some  _  of how to build nests, but none of them
waiting to the  _  .
The magpie went on working without noticing until the only bird that   _  was the
turtledove . He hadn't paid any   _  all along, but only kept on saying
its silly cry, "Take two, take two-o-o-o!" The magpie said, "One is  _  ."
But the turtledove kept on saying, "Take two, take two-o-o-o!" The magpie got  _  and said, "You just need one, I tell you!" Still the turtledove cried, "Take
two, take two-o-o-o!"
At last, the magpie   _  up but she saw  _  near her except the silly turtledove,
and then she flew away and  _  to tell the birds how to build nests again.
That is why different birds build their nests   _  .
